data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: We grow fearless when we do the things we fear.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The activity you’re most avoiding contains your biggest opportunity.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Fill your brain with giant dreams so that there’s no space for petty pursuits.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: No one will believe in you until you believe in you.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Greatness begins beyond your comfort zone.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You are born into genius, but have you resigned yourself to mediocrity?

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Great achievement always requires great sacrifice.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your ‘I Can’ is more important than your IQ.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Your excuses are just the lies your fears have sold you.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Having talent is fantastic. Having confidence is even more important.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Every minute spent worrying about the way things were is a moment stolen from creating the way things can be.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Take the stones people throw at you and use them to build a monument.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Don’t confuse activity with productivity. Many people are simply busy being busy.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: When we stop taking risks, we stop living life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Today’s a great day to behave as the person you’ve always wanted to be.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Make your faith larger than your fears and your dreams bigger than your doubts.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be slow to criticize and fast to appreciate.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t be great if you don’t feel great. Make exceptional health your number one priority.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t win if you don’t try.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: If you want to have the results only 5% have, you must be willing to do and think like only 5% do and think.
